title: Nick Jonas groped during concert in Los Angeles, video shows
text:
USA TODAY

A video shared on social media shows Nick Jonas being groped while he was onstage at a concert earlier this week in Los Angeles.

In the video, a fan is seen touching Jonas' leg, grazing his butt and attempting to reach between his legs. Jonas pushes the hand away. He also turned to see who the culprit was.

The incident happened at the Hollywood Bowl, where Nick and his brothers Kevin and Joe were performing during a stop on the Jonas Brothers' Happiness Begins tour.

Jonas has not publicly commented on the situation, but thanked fans for selling out both nights.

"Hollywood Bowl night 2. Thank you to every single one of you who made these two sold out nights so incredible," he tweeted. "I am so grateful."

His followers took to the comment section to apologize about the harassment.

"Also, you deserve to be treated like a HUMAN being!! I’m sorry some 'fans' don’t respect that," one person tweeted.

"i love you you deserve respect," another said.

USA TODAY has reached out to Jonas' rep for comment.
